verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonderful : <S%G2298><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Plagues <S%G4127><s%> Seven, <S%G2033><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last; <S%G2078><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Was Completed <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Sing <S%G103><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Song <S%G5603><s%> Of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Song <S%G5603><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb, <S%G721><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonderful Are <S%G2298><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Thy Works, <S%G4675><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Almighty; <S%G3841><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> True Are <S%G228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3598><s%> Thy Ways, Thou <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Saints. <S%G40><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Should Fear <S%G5399><s%>, Thee, <S%G4571><s%> O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glorify <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Thy Name? <S%G4675><s%> For Thou <S%G3754><s%> Only Art <S%G3441><s%> Holy; <S%G3741><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Shall Come <S%G2240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Do Homage <S%G4352><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Thee; <S%G4675><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1345><s%> Thy Righteous Acts <S%G4675><s%> Were Manifested. <S%G5319><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Was Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Testimony <S%G3142><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven; <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Came Forth <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Plagues <S%G4127><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G3485><s%> Clothed In <S%G1746><s%> Linen <S%G3043><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bright, <S%G2986><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Girt With <S%G4024><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Breasts <S%G4738><s%> Girdles <S%G2223><s%> Golden. <S%G5552><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures <S%G2226><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Bowls <S%G5357><s%> Golden, <S%G5552><s%> Full <S%G1073><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Lives <S%G2198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Filled <S%G1072><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> With Smoke <S%G2586><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1411><s%> His Power : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Was Able <S%G1410><s%> To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Until <S%G891><s%> Were Completed <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Plagues <S%G4127><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Angels. <S%G32><s%>
